title: Help! Game crashes...
body: It happened me a few times, that my game crashed during loading (the screen went completely black, and nothing worked, not even ctrl+alt+delete), and because of that i got punished as AFK... how can i prevent this in the future? Please help! I don't want to be AFK, but my game doesn't work.

replies.body: Hey buddy! I would love to help you out. You should try the game crash KB and see if that works out for you: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes
